name: Lights Out
description:
Darkness descends upon the group; It's time to hide.
Use your abilities to survive, or hope you're not the next one getting dragged away.
The hunters will have to choose their prey carefully, or they'll risk being spotted.

end_round.title: You check your surroundings
end_round.description: Everyone is still alive; the hunters have failed, but for how long?

end_round.title: The smell of blood hits you
The smell of blood hits you
end_round.description: How many corpses can you see?

name: Lights On
description:
The lights flicker and turn on. You scan your surroundings and check who's still there. 
It's time to spot the hidden enemy and kill him. Discuss together and vote someone to kill before the lights go out again.

end_round.title: Judgement has been passed
end_round.description: SCP-███ starts humming, and someone starts screaming. A pile of ashes is soon on the floor. The room seems darker.
